alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Greenwood County through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Abbeville, or near Troy, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Ninety Six, Troy, Lake Greenwood State Park, Greenwood State Park, Ninety Six Historic Site, Lake Greenwood, Promised Land, Bradley and Kirksey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
